attributes.action: charge landlords business rates on rented properties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Excessive funds are being diverted to unproductive speculative investment in property.  One of the reasons for this is the tax treatment of rented property.

Renting houses and flats is a business and so the premises should attract business rates.  These should be paid by the owner of the property, i.e. the landlord.
